pages.title: Apple Trees
pages.text: Apple trees are a fruit tree, and a variant of oak. They spawn in plains biomes by default. These trees will, over time and after maturing, grow apples from the leaves that can be harvested.

The growth of fruit can will depend on the season if a season mod such as Serene Seasons is installed, otherwise it grows year-round.$(br2)Once harvested, to obtain more seeds to replant just use a $(l:mechanics/dirt_bucket)dirt bucket$() to turn your surplus of apples into extra seeds.
